page.title: 19T.V. PROG. WATCHED IN LEO.
page.content: In the majority of families there are at least two televisions, black and white and colour. Almost half the families also have a video recorder, using it to record T.V. programmes and watch hired films. The most popular T.V. channel is I.T.V. with B.B.C. being the least popular. A cartoon programme called Dungeons and Dragons is the most popular T.V. programme, with Horror, Comedy and Sport being the most popular type of programme. News progammes are the least liked T.V. programmes. Most children watch Breakfast T.V., either every morning or sometimes, and very few children do not watch Saturday morning T.V. It would seem that television plays an important part in Leominster children's lives.
